Inventado hace menos de un siglo, el pl√°stico ya ha cambiado la historia del planeta y se ha establecido como un elemento ubicuo en la naturaleza. Invented less than a century ago, plastic has already changed the planet's history and established itself as a ubiquitous element in nature. In the last ten years we have produced more plastic than in all of human history, but less than a fifth of world production is recycled.
Movements like #breakfreefromplastic want to reverse this trend, how about you? Do you want to change the world?
